info.title: Project Demand Status - Read
info.description: This service enables you to read project demand statuses along with their descriptions. You can use this service, for example, to retrieve supported values for the corresponding field in the **Project Demand** entity of the **Project Demand** API, or to make the descriptions of the status values available for your custom application.

x-sap-shortText: Read project demand statuses using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Project Control - Resourcing and Procurement(4RF)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/4RF " Link To BP ")
[Project Control - Resourcing and Procurement(PRF)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/PRF " Link To BP ")
